overview: VMD (Visual Molecular Dynamics) is a molecular visualization program that enables researchers to visualize and analyze molecular dynamics simulations, protein structures, and biomolecular complexes. It provides a range of visualization and analysis tools for studying molecular systems in biophysics and computational biology.
core_features: Visualizing molecular structures and dynamics in 3D
Rendering high-quality molecular graphics and animations
Analyzing trajectories from molecular dynamics simulations
Integration with various molecular modeling and simulation software
